text: Thailand's Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra, http://ow.ly/12t6o
Interview @KeepMeNot

We held a summit with President Calderón in Mexico. This year is the 400th anniversary of exchange between Japan and Mexico. And concerning global warming COP 16 is Mexico's chair country. In the milestone year, we decided to jointly declare our determination to strengthen friendship cooperation relations between the two countries. http://bit.ly/dzn8za
Come back from Switzerland. The meeting is going well.
My interview w BBC World News' @NikGowing airs tonight on new prog. 'The Hub' @ 16:00 GMT in case u have nothing better to do!
The National Assembly also enters the third week, and in a representative question, controversy over my administrative policy speech etc. continues. It is everyday that the tension continues.

A real dove cafe, a short public offering period, about 700 people received applications. Thank you very much. Actually, I'd like to invite you, but I can invite you this time after 10 names. I would like to hear a story firmly for each and every one.

It is a representative question in the plenary session to this day. The total number of questions from representatives of each faction may exceed 100 questions per day. There is time constraint, and it is said that it is said that it is too long to answer carefully, so it is annoying.

Today is the beginning of spring. Spring is on the calendar, but it still has a cold day. I wrote about "new public" in the mail magazine. Please look. http://bit.ly/b6asE9
Snow falling in Amman today; my little one willing the white stuff out of the sky faster so he can build a snowman.
Mama, on the other hand, is quite happy to sit by the fire. Snowmen are Daddies' jobs, right?

Today, Dazaifu Tenmangu Shrine "Embassy of plum" came to the official residence. I got a plum bonsai to inform you of the arrival of spring. I would like to do my best from tomorrow so that the draft budget being deliberated will also bear fruit.

We received the "Leadership Award" at the "Delhi Sustainable Development Summit" in India. I am deeply honored. I would like to work hard on the issue of global warming so as not to be ashamed of this award. I could not attend the awards ceremony, so I entrusted my feelings to the message. http://bit.ly/9irY9C
Friends: here we are with my family in ranco taking advantage of the last weekend to do some sport, rest and return on Monday
@ Bryant732000 that's right!
@twiterillo had not had a minute for nothing!

Today, I encouraged the SDF 's supply supporters returning from the Indian Ocean and the troops dispatched to Haiti PKO. Under the harsh environment, I sent a heart-warming ale to the members of the people who protect the world's life. There was something that approached the chest as you looked at the face of a small child who was coming to see me off to pick up.
Today I gave an interview for the school newspaper Hrvoje and Dominik. http://bit.ly/aufsys

During the opening of the Diet, from early morning till late night, I will be busy preparing answers and meeting. The official residence of the workplace and the residence of the residence are 20 seconds on foot, saving time and being saved. After the work, turn the doorknob of the official residence. It is a moment of relief. Because the workmanship is beautiful, I took it in the picture. http://bit.ly/cqDqEA

I met with Palestinian Authority's President Abbas. The Middle East is not a "distant area" from Japan. I promised that I would not spare Japan as Japan so that Palestine and Israel could coexist in peace. http://bit.ly/an6IvL

My relationship with Vice President Suthep No problem, according to the news. The party's agenda is still left. we stay together Thanks!

My twitter is also being read by high school students and college students. There were opinions such as employment and concerns about the future, and that politicians are talking only to adults. I think about politicians thinking about everyone who is responsible for the future of Japan, and I would like to speak in an easy-to-understand way.
Upcoming elections should be characterized by peace,security,stability - Rwandans must fully,freely and fairly express..http://bit.ly/cE4adh
The Prime Minister does not react and is not afraid of the curse of HRH. I do not want to encroach on Thai sovereignty. http://ow.ly/15Jnb

I finished the certification ceremony in the palace and appointed Yukio Edano as Minister in charge of administrative reform. It is a Democratic Party of Japan who worked as a big wheel in sorting business. I will also borrow his strength and I will proceed with the "cleaning of the administration."
I do not want to get rid of the bill. To enter the Senate. http://ow.ly/15JoT

Intensive discussion was held today at the House of Representatives Budget Committee. Regarding the issue of political funds, I believe it is my responsibility to repeatedly explain it until you are satisfied.
On my birthday, I received congratulatory words from many people on my wish. Thank you very much. It really encourages me.

Tomorrow we will hold "Real Pigeon Cafe" at the official residence. This is my first childhood raising cafe. Actually, the second grandchild was born the other day, but tomorrow I am looking forward to see a story from my mum and children who have children who will live the same era as my grandchildren.
Watch the list of confidence in Thailand. The Prime Minister responds to several correspondents on Channel 11.
It is a real pigeon cafe from now. I am looking forward to it.

Today I invited my mother and dad raising parents to the official residence and opened a real pigeon cafe. I was able to listen to "the present living word" from everyone, and I spent a very precious time. I played with the children and returned to my childhood. Please keep listening to your voice.
Tomorrow we will start "Cooperation for work". See the program for the first two days here: http://bit.ly/bZXD80

Just wrapping up my time in España for #GSMA conference before moving on to Italia for Sanremo festival.

The Paralympics will begin on March 12. I attended the encouragement meeting earlier. I feel I've divided the energy of the players. At the Olympic Games, speed skating boys 500 meters, Keiichiro Nagashima played silver medal, and Kato Tsuyoshi won a bronze medal wonderfully. congratulations!

Many comments have been received from everyone about the real pigeon cafe the day before yesterday. Thank you very much. I would like to reflect the opinions you've sent to the pigeon cafe next time. You can see the state of the day from PC here. http://bit.ly/afSQlk
At 10 o'clock, I will explain "cooperation for work" for the Storting http://bit.ly/cMp8h. #cooperation

The first party party debate as the leader of the ruling party ended. I regret to say that it was a discussion centered on my own political funds etc., but I tried to explain as carefully as possible. In future, I would like to discuss such a feeling that I want to improve this country, so that people can convey to my citizens.
In Italy for Sanremo Festival where Andrea Bocelli found fame & fortune. Hoping message of Education for All finds stardom too!
Flattered 2 be guest of honor at 60th Sanremo Festival! Looking forward to display of Italian talent and plugging Education for All
This Friday we will make known our team of undersecretaries who join the ministers and q will be the soul and heart of the government
Tomorrow I will take the oath to perform my duties conscientiously and to serve Croatia. I'm proud of the big feeling ... http://bit.ly/9aUoxi
San Remo interview was an excuse to pop into Italy and visit that part of me that's permanently parked there
I thank the Italian people whose love has been with me from very first day, when I became queen at 28, scared & unsure.
Glad that education call got a strong reception with mobile operators at #mwc
At #mwc signal loud & clear-they have power 2 give children teacher in their pocket, classroom in their hand, & future at their fingertips
#mwc Smooth operators can be game-variables for education-now that's a disruptive innovation I'd take to the bank!
The Prime Minister is ready to be fair to those affected by the use of the GET 200. http://ow.ly/18zcE

We held a social gathering around Bill Drayton called "Father of Social Entrepreneur". I felt the importance of the idea of ​​"transformation" that changes behavior to make society better and the importance of "empathy" to share human pain. I think that Drayton's story gave the young social entrepreneurs great courage.
The Prime Minister also revealed the results of online lottery. http://ow.ly/18zji
Prime Minister expects 1-2 weeks to know the results of the online lottery.

On the way to London to attend a conference organized by the Policy Network on the financial crisis http://bit.ly/btGcKx

I met Kenya Prime Minister Odininga. "I can not meet mountains and mountains, but humans can meet each other." It is a proverb equivalent to Swahili's "Ichigo-no-kai". Do you not feel respect for nature and humans? We will cooperate so that Africa can develop beautiful nature while developing.

I went to the primary school in Tokyo, crime prevention volunteers, and post-partum care sites. People in the community and NPO touched the appearance of teaching children Bamboo dragonfly, patrolling crime prevention and caring for mothers after childbirth and realized the spread of "new public". Especially the female activity was impressive. http://bit.ly/aT2g99

I am looking forward to the performance of the Olympic Games, but it is a great actress award for Terashima Shinobu's Berlin Film Festival's leading actress. In Berlin, director Yoji Yoji won the Special Achievement Award, and the work of the Director General of the act received the International Critics Federation Prize. Activities of Japanese people around the world, we are proud.
We have to take our responsibilities beyond the point of just doing our job. We can do much better-Rwanda needs it http://bit.ly/xIwUx

I asked an event "Children's Food Session" that children think about food self-sufficiency rate. We received proposals with dreams from "Children's Ambassador of Children" selected from the whole country. I wrote about blog contacts with children, so please have a look. http://bit.ly/8ZRbfi
The Prime Minister ordered the Ministry of Science and Technology. Report supported plans before terminating using GT200 http://ow.ly/19Igc
Thai Prime Minister pleads not to violence Do not repeat the European football at a downhill because of the problem. http://ow.ly/19IgQ

Today at the House of Representatives Budget Committee, there was discussion on economic and diplomatic focus. I could not attend the LDP, but I discussed about the economy, deflationary measures, security and so on.
The Diet deliberation of the child allowance bill has finally begun. It is a bill to put the promise in the manifest into practice. We will firmly deliberate and aim for the establishment.

My wife made "Rice gratin" grain declared when trying trial at Sunday's event. I also used soy milk, but I made it delicious as expected. When you use rice flour, you get a dashy texture. I would like to try it elsewhere.
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs If the people send the information.

I heard the result of the Olympic Girls figure. Asada, Ando, ​​Suzuki players, it was a wonderful success. I am looking forward to the day after tomorrow. I support you!

Young people may not understand, but muscle aches slowly after a few days when they are over 60 years old. I did something like a photo on Saturday, but the abdominal muscles are sore so long. I have to exercise more usually. http://bit.ly/dAWou 7
There is no new agenda for the new cabinet.
Lottery Case Online The Supreme Court dismissed the petition of Jago. The lawsuit is final and the contract is not effective. It does not have to be a compensation issue.

I believe that the government is responsible for the care of the 26th day to go well.

I was impressed by the people who met self-deceased children and worked on their own activities by overcoming the sorrow lost by the parents. A new determination was made that nearly 100 people should change their current situation that they will die their own life on a day. I also wrote to the e-mail magazine. http://bit.ly/9bBhZD

An earthquake of M 8.8 occurred in Chile. I am contemplating the victims of a major earthquake following Haiti. At the local embassy, ​​we are working on confirming the safety of 38 Japanese residents near the epicenter. We instructed related ministries and agencies to prepare for quick support.
Returning from inspection damage earthquake concepcion-talcahuano. The most painful loss of lives. We will have great challenge of reconstruction
